title: Any11
author: Any11
created_time: September 19, 2022, 11:51:03 AMLast edit: March 11, 2023, 07:51:55 PM by Any11
content: Hi. I have many fully verified bookmaker accounts for sale (in countries like UK, Germany, Italy, Spain, Canada and others).These are not stolen accounts, I deal with registration - verification - deposit - withdrawal. Accounts are suitable for everyone who has been limited but wants to continue betting, for people who have their own profitable betting strategies or who have information on match-fixing, value-betting, late-betting etc. Any attempts at money laundering will be stopped!For more info, you may contact me using:E-mail - ZhV0jukKX6X@protonmail.comTelegram - ZhV0jukKX6X.t.me / @ZhV0jukKX6XTelegram channel - Any_betting_accounts or using private messages on this forum.

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: Fully verified accounts? Selling it to another people. It is against the ToS of all gambling sites, fiat, crypto or both fiat/crypto based casinos. Quote from: Any11 on September 19, 2022, 11:51:03 AMThese are not stolen accounts, I deal with registration - verification - deposit - withdrawal. Accounts are suitable for everyone who has been limited but wants to continue betting, for people who have their own profitable betting strategies or who have information on match-fixing, value-betting, late-betting etc. Deposit and withdrawal? I can sense a means you can scam there.Quote from: Any11 on September 19, 2022, 11:51:03 AMAny attempts at money laundering will be stopped!How are you going to know? That would effectively only be done by the gambling sites that know a deposit to be a laundered money. I believe you are more after profit and nothing more. That is why you are going against the ToS of all gambling sites.

I've seen a lot of threads like this, I hope it doesn't violate the forum rules, otherwise mine and all such will have to be deleted. Regarding deposits and withdrawals, this is for convenience. But a person can use their banks/e-wallets or can ask us to give them Neteller/Skrill etc.You can scam almost anywhere if you want to. Anything can be negotiated if there is a desire to make it safe.
